column6: The true story of the Avengers is revealed right here!  This five-issue extravaganza reveals previously untold details of the historic first meeting of Thor, Iron Man, the Hulk, Ant-Man and the Wasp!  You only THINK you know the full story.  From Joe Casey (AVENGERS: EARTH'S MIGHTIEST HEROES) and artist extraordinaire Phil Noto! Rated A ...$3.99
column7: | Hank Pym | Hulk | Iron Man | Thor | Wasp
column8: | writer:Joe Casey | colorist:Phil Noto | letterer:Richard Starkings
